      • setFeatures

        public Morph.Builder setFeatures(Iterable<MorphFeature> features)
        Sets the features.
        Parameters:
        features - the features
        Returns:
        the builder

      • setSourceOffsets

        public Morph.Builder setSourceOffsets(Iterable<CharOffset> offsets)
        Sets the source offsets. Multiple source offsets are supported in the case of a morph that represents non-continuous characters in the source (e.g., a circumfix, a consonant template). If only a single source offset is desired, setSingleSourceOffset(adept.common.CharOffset) is more convenient.
        Parameters:
        offsets - the source offsets
        Returns:
        the builder

      • setSingleSourceOffset

        public Morph.Builder setSingleSourceOffset(CharOffset offset)
        Sets a source offset as the sole source offset for this morph. This is a convenience method for the common case where a morph token is associated with a single character offset.
        Parameters:
        offset - the source offset
        Returns:
        the builder

      • build

        public Morph build()
        Creates the Morph instance.
        Returns:
        the morph
